content: 40 not count as a stitch for stitch count purposes and as such this stitch should not be worked into in the subsequent round round 5 increase in every fourth stitch vintage vibes basic beanie pattern image 1 1 to commence the round stndst in the previous round stndst 2 double_crochet in each of the next two stitches 3 2 double_crochet in the next stitch solid rounds increase 4 double_crochet in each of the next three stitches 5 2 double_crochet in the next stitch round 1 make a circle note beginning chain 2 does not count as a stitch 6 repeat steps 4 and 5 eight times 1 with first colour yarn make a closed circle using either magic_ring or 3-4 chain and 7 slip_stitch into the stndst from step 1 then slip_stitch into first chain stitch count 50 2 chain 2 then double_crochet 10 times into circle if using magic_ring now pull taut 3 slip_stitch into first double_crochet skip 2 chain to close circle round 6 increase in every fifth stitch stitch count 10 excluding beginning 2 chain 1 to commence the round stndst in the previous round stndst 2 double_crochet in each of the next three stitches round 2 double the stitch count 3 2 double_crochet in the next stitch 1 to commence the round stndst1 in first double_crochet from previous round 4 double_crochet in each of the next four stitches 2 double_crochet in the same stitch that the stndst was made 5 2 double_crochet in the next stitch 3 2 double_crochet in each of the remaining stitches around 6 repeat steps 4 and 5 eight times 4 slip_stitch into the stndst from step 1 7 slip_stitch into the stndst from step 1 stitch count 20 2 dcs made in each stitch from round 1 stitch count 60 round 3 increase in every second stitch round 7 increase in every sixth stitch 1 to commence the round stndst in the previous round stndst 1 to commence the round stndst in the previous round stndst 2 double_crochet in the next stitch 2 double_crochet in each of the next four stitches 3 2 double_crochet in the next stitch 3 2 double_crochet in the next stitch 4 repeat steps 3 and 4 eight times 4 double_crochet in each of the next five stitches 5 slip_stitch into the stndst from step 1 5 2 double_crochet in the next stitch stitch count 30 6 repeat steps 4 and 5 eight times round 4 increase in every third stitch 7 slip_stitch into the stndst from step 1 1 to commence the round stndst in the previous round stndst stitch count 70 2 double_crochet in the next stitch round 8 increase in every seventh stitch 3 2 double_crochet in the next stitch 1 to commence the round stndst in the previous round stndst 4 double_crochet in each of the next two stitches 2 double_crochet in each of the next five stitches 3 2 double_crochet in the next stitch 1 or substitute with 3 chain if
